text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Then, Producer!
Could you please explain again!

I've been entrusted. This time, everyone will be
performing a live as a unit......

I really want them to showcase the essence of "Houkura"
So, let's start brainstorming ideas for that purpose

Since I heard from the Producer the other day,
I've been thinking about it at home too!

Filled with sparkle,
like a thrilling superhero battle──!

I want to create a live where all the fans
are smiling!
Oh, that's a great idea that came out of nowhere!

Yeah, sparkle... is it about lighting after all?
Or should we shine too?
Yes...

Like a human mirror ball......
It's a challenging theme!
Wait, isn't it getting further and further away!?

Hehe, anyway!
To give it our all, we need a plan!

There's so much to decide and so much to do,
we need to proceed efficiently!

──So,
could you entrust me with everyone's time?

From here until the live, scheduling is what I want to
handle. I'll show you a perfectly planned schedule!

Thank you!
──Then, let's confirm the future course of action

To achieve the best live,
we need thorough preparation

In addition to our usual practice, intense self-training,
let's also have regular meetings

──I'll take charge of the planning,
so let's run through this together until the end!
Yes! / Yeah! / Okay / Yes...
